```diff
+ <script setup lang="ts">
```

é¦–å…ˆï¼Œè®©æˆ‘ä»¬åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„æŠ¥å‘ŠæœåŠ¡ç»„ä»¶ï¼š

```diff
- 
+ import axios from 'axios'
+ 
+ interface ReportData {
+   id: string;
+   name: string;
+   type: string;
+   content: any;
+   createTime: Date;
+ }
+ 
+ class ReportService {
+   private baseUrl = '/api/reports'
+ 
+   // ç”ŸæˆHTMLæŠ¥å‘Š
+   async generateReport(data: ReportData): Promise<string> {
+     try {
+       const response = await axios.post(`${this.baseUrl}/generate`, data)
+       return response.data.reportUrl
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('ç”ŸæˆæŠ¥å‘Šå¤±è´¥:', error)
+       throw error
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   // ä¸Šä¼ æŠ¥å‘Šæ–‡ä»¶
+   async uploadReport(file: File): Promise<string> {
+     const formData = new FormData()
+     formData.append('file', file)
+ 
+     try {
+       const response = await axios.post(`${this.baseUrl}/upload`, formData, {
+         headers: {
+           'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data'
+         }
+       })
+       return response.data.fileUrl
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('ä¸Šä¼ æŠ¥å‘Šå¤±è´¥:', error)
+       throw error
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   // ä¸‹è½½æŠ¥å‘Š
+   async downloadReport(reportId: string): Promise<Blob> {
+     try {
+       const response = await axios.get(`${this.baseUrl}/download/${reportId}`, {
+         responseType: 'blob'
+       })
+       return response.data
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('ä¸‹è½½æŠ¥å‘Šå¤±è´¥:', error)
+       throw error
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   // è·å–æŠ¥å‘Šåˆ—è¡¨
+   async getReports(page: number = 1, limit: number = 10): Promise<any> {
+     try {
+       const response = await axios.get(`${this.baseUrl}/list`, {
+         params: { page, limit }
+       })
+       return response.data
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('è·å–æŠ¥å‘Šåˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥:', error)
+       throw error
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   // åˆ é™¤æŠ¥å‘Š
+   async deleteReport(reportId: string): Promise<void> {
+     try {
+       await axios.delete(`${this.baseUrl}/${reportId}`)
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('åˆ é™¤æŠ¥å‘Šå¤±è´¥:', error)
+       throw error
+     }
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ export const reportService = new ReportService() 
```

```diff
+     document.body.appendChild(a)
+     a.click()

+ // åˆ é™¤æŠ¥å‘Š
```

```diff
- 
+ const express = require('express');
+ const cors = require('cors');
+ const multer = require('multer');
+ const path = require('path');
+ const fs = require('fs');
+ 
+ const app = express();
+ const port = 3000;
+ 
+ // å¯ç”¨ CORS
+ app.use(cors());
+ 
+ // é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶å­˜å‚¨
+ const storage = multer.diskStorage({
+   destination: function (req, file, cb) {
+     const uploadDir = 'uploads';
+     if (!fs.existsSync(uploadDir)) {
+       fs.mkdirSync(uploadDir);
+     }
+     cb(null, uploadDir);
+   },
+   filename: function (req, file, cb) {
+     cb(null, Date.now() + '-' + file.originalname);
+   }
+ });
+ 
+ const upload = multer({ storage: storage });
+ 
+ // é™æ€æ–‡ä»¶æœåŠ¡
+ app.use('/uploads', express.static('uploads'));
+ 
+ // ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶æ¥å£
+ app.post('/api/upload', upload.single('file'), (req, res) => {
+   if (!req.file) {
+     return res.status(400).json({ error: 'æ²¡æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ ' });
+   }
+ 
+   const fileUrl = `http://localhost:${port}/uploads/${req.file.filename}`;
+   res.json({
+     message: 'æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ æˆåŠŸ',
+     fileUrl: fileUrl,
+     fileName: req.file.originalname,
+     fileSize: req.file.size
+   });
+ });
+ 
+ // è·å–æ–‡ä»¶åˆ—è¡¨æ¥å£
+ app.get('/api/files', (req, res) => {
+   const uploadDir = 'uploads';
+   if (!fs.existsSync(uploadDir)) {
+     return res.json([]);
+   }
+ 
+   const files = fs.readdirSync(uploadDir).map(filename => {
+     const stats = fs.statSync(path.join(uploadDir, filename));
+     return {
+       name: filename,
+       url: `http://localhost:${port}/uploads/${filename}`,
+       size: stats.size,
+       createTime: stats.birthtime
+     };
+   });
+ 
+   res.json(files);
+ });
+ 
+ // åˆ é™¤æ–‡ä»¶æ¥å£
+ app.delete('/api/files/:filename', (req, res) => {
+   const filename = req.params.filename;
+   const filepath = path.join('uploads', filename);
+ 
+   if (fs.existsSync(filepath)) {
+     fs.unlinkSync(filepath);
+     res.json({ message: 'æ–‡ä»¶åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ' });
+   } else {
+     res.status(404).json({ error: 'æ–‡ä»¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨' });
+   }
+ });
+ 
+ app.listen(port, () => {
+   console.log(`æœåŠ¡å™¨è¿è¡Œåœ¨ http://localhost:${port}`);
+ }); 
```

```diff
+   private formatFileSize(bytes: number): string {
+     if (bytes === 0) return '0 B'
+     const k = 1024
+     const sizes = ['B', 'KB', 'MB', 'GB']
+     const i = Math.floor(Math.log(bytes) / Math.log(k))
+     return parseFloat((bytes / Math.pow(k, i)).toFixed(2)) + ' ' + sizes[i]
+   }
```

```diff
+ const express = require('express');
+ const cors = require('cors');
+ const multer = require('multer');
+ const path = require('path');
+ const fs = require('fs');
+ 
+ const app = express();
+ const port = 3000;
+ 
+ // å¯ç”¨ CORS
+ app.use(cors());
+ 
+ // é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶å­˜å‚¨
+ const storage = multer.diskStorage({
+   destination: function (req, file, cb) {
+     const uploadDir = 'uploads';
+     if (!fs.existsSync(uploadDir)) {
+       fs.mkdirSync(uploadDir);
+     }
+     cb(null, uploadDir);
+   },
+   filename: function (req, file, cb) {
+     cb(null, Date.now() + '-' + file.originalname);
+   }
+ });
+ 
+ const upload = multer({ storage: storage });
+ 
+ // é™æ€æ–‡ä»¶æœåŠ¡
+ app.use('/uploads', express.static('uploads'));
+ 
+ // ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶æ¥å£
+ app.post('/api/upload', upload.single('file'), (req, res) => {
+   if (!req.file) {
+     return res.status(400).json({ error: 'æ²¡æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ ' });
+   }
+ 
+   const fileUrl = `http://localhost:${port}/uploads/${req.file.filename}`;
+   res.json({
+     message: 'æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ æˆåŠŸ',
+     fileUrl: fileUrl,
+     fileName: req.file.originalname,
+     fileSize: req.file.size
+   });
+ });
+ 
+ // è·å–æ–‡ä»¶åˆ—è¡¨æ¥å£
+ app.get('/api/files', (req, res) => {
+   const uploadDir = 'uploads';
+   if (!fs.existsSync(uploadDir)) {
+     return res.json([]);
+   }
+ 
+   const files = fs.readdirSync(uploadDir).map(filename => {
+     const stats = fs.statSync(path.join(uploadDir, filename));
+     return {
+       name: filename,
+       url: `http://localhost:${port}/uploads/${filename}`,
+       size: stats.size,
+       createTime: stats.birthtime
+     };
+   });
+ 
+   res.json(files);
+ });
+ 
+ // åˆ é™¤æ–‡ä»¶æ¥å£
+ app.delete('/api/files/:filename', (req, res) => {
+   const filename = req.params.filename;
+   const filepath = path.join('uploads', filename);
+ 
+   if (fs.existsSync(filepath)) {
+     fs.unlinkSync(filepath);
+     res.json({ message: 'æ–‡ä»¶åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ' });
+   } else {
+     res.status(404).json({ error: 'æ–‡ä»¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨' });
+   }
+ });
+ 
+ app.listen(port, () => {
+   console.log(`æœåŠ¡å™¨è¿è¡Œåœ¨ http://localhost:${port}`);
+ });
```

5. æ›´æ–°æœåŠ¡å™¨å…¥å£æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š

```antml:function_calls>
<invoke name="edit_file">
<parameter name="target_file">vue-project/server/index.js</parameter>
<parameter name="instructions">æ›´æ–°æœåŠ¡å™¨å…¥å£æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæ·»åŠ  MongoDB è¿æ¥å’Œç›¸å…³è·¯ç”±</parameter>
<parameter name="code_edit">const express = require('express');
const cors = require('cors');
const multer = require('multer');
const path = require('path');
const fs = require('fs');
const connectDB = require('./config/db');

const app = express();
const port = 3000;

// è¿æ¥æ•°æ®åº“
connectDB();

// å¯ç”¨ CORS
app.use(cors());
app.use(express.json());

// é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶å­˜å‚¨
const storage = multer.diskStorage({
  destination: function (req, file, cb) {
    const uploadDir = 'uploads';
    if (!fs.existsSync(uploadDir)) {
      fs.mkdirSync(uploadDir);
    }
    cb(null, uploadDir);
  },
  filename: function (req, file, cb) {
    cb(null, Date.now() + '-' + file.originalname);
  }
});

const upload = multer({ storage: storage });

// é™æ€æ–‡ä»¶æœåŠ¡
app.use('/uploads', express.static('uploads'));

// API è·¯ç”±
// ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶æ¥å£
app.post('/api/upload', upload.single('file'), async (req, res) => {
  if (!req.file) {
    return res.status(400).json({ error: 'æ²¡æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ ' });
  }

  const fileUrl = `http://localhost:${port}/uploads/${req.file.filename}`;
  res.json({
    message: 'æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ æˆåŠŸ',
    fileUrl: fileUrl,
    fileName: req.file.originalname,
    fileSize: req.file.size
  });

// è·å–æ–‡ä»¶åˆ—è¡¨æ¥å£
app.get('/api/files', async (req, res) => {
  const uploadDir = 'uploads';
  if (!fs.existsSync(uploadDir)) {
    return res.json([]);
  }

  const files = fs.readdirSync(uploadDir).map(filename => {
    const stats = fs.statSync(path.join(uploadDir, filename));
    return {
      name: filename,
      url: `http://localhost:${port}/uploads/${filename}`,
      size: stats.size,
      createTime: stats.birthtime
    };
  });

  res.json(files);
});

// åˆ é™¤æ–‡ä»¶æ¥å£
app.delete('/api/files/:filename', async (req, res) => {
  const filename = req.params.filename;
  const filepath = path.join('uploads', filename);

  if (fs.existsSync(filepath)) {
    fs.unlinkSync(filepath);
    res.json({ message: 'æ–‡ä»¶åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ' });
  } else {
    res.status(404).json({ error: 'æ–‡ä»¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨' });
  }
});

app.listen(port, () => {
  console.log(`æœåŠ¡å™¨è¿è¡Œåœ¨ http://localhost:${port}`);
});</parameter>
</invoke>
```

```diff
+ import { reportService } from '../services/ReportService'
+ 
+ export default defineComponent({
+   name: 'ReportList',
+   setup() {
+     const files = ref([])
+     const fileInput = ref<HTMLInputElement | null>(null)
+ 
+     const loadFiles = async () => {
+       try {
+         files.value = await reportService.getReports()
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('åŠ è½½æ–‡ä»¶åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥:', error)
+       }

+       const input = event.target as HTMLInputElement
+       if (input.files && input.files.length > 0) {
+         try {
+           await reportService.uploadReport(input.files[0])
+           await loadFiles()
+         } catch (error) {
+           console.error('ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥:', error)

+           await reportService.deleteReport(fileId)

+         }

+       if (bytes === 0) return '0 B'
+       const k = 1024
+       const sizes = ['B', 'KB', 'MB', 'GB']
+       const i = Math.floor(Math.log(bytes) / Math.log(k))
+       return parseFloat((bytes / Math.pow(k, i)).toFixed(2)) + ' ' + sizes[i]
+     }
+

+       loadFiles()
+     })
```

ç°åœ¨æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦æ›´æ–°è·¯ç”±é…ç½®ï¼Œè®©æˆ‘ä»¬ä¿®æ”¹ `router/index.ts` æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š



---

```diff
- 
+ import { createRouter, createWebHistory } from 'vue-router'
+ import HomeView from '../views/HomeView.vue'
+ import Login from '../views/Login.vue'
+ import Register from '../views/Register.vue'
+ 
+ const router = createRouter({
+   history: createWebHistory(import.meta.env.BASE_URL),
+   routes: [
+     {
+       path: '/',
+       name: 'home',
+       component: HomeView
+     },
+     {
+       path: '/login',
+       name: 'login',
+       component: Login
+     },
+     {
+       path: '/register',
+       name: 'register',
+       component: Register
+     }
+   ]
+ })
+ 
+ export default router 
```

```diff
+     }
+   } catch (error) {
```
```diff
+     console.error('æ³¨å†Œå¤±è´¥:', error)
+     alert('æ³¨å†Œå¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åé‡è¯•')
```
